resources:
Lifeline Mission We connect blood banks and hospitals in an automated way and reducing time. We connect with hospitals using our platform so that they can manage their databases. We made this for hospitals who would like to be a part of this changing system. Gratitude to those supporting us Supportgit remote add origin https://github.com/[username]/[project_name].git Strategy To stop wastage of expired blood and bringing transparency in the system. Vision
Map Emergency? Add database Find Blood Group Error: Cannot Delete Image saved
OK Access to the camera is needed for detection This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
